characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily. A motorcyclist appears on the right side and suddenly loses control, causing a collision with the white sedan.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while following the white sedan. As the motorcyclist loses control and collides with the white sedan, the self-driving vehicle decelerates to avoid further collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, losing control and colliding with the white sedan.
